Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back XMAS AT SEA SYDNEY NEW YEAR View gallery / Back Azamara Crew at Christmas Napier, New Zealand New Zealand & Australia 'Tis the Season: Auckland to Melbourne 16 Night Cruise 2026 SAILING HOT EXCLUSIVE Overview Inclusions Cabin Types Terms & Conditions Celebrate Christmas on board Azamara Pursuit with a 16-night New Zealand & Australia holiday cruise from Wellington to Melbourne. Explore vibrant cities, picturesque coastlines, and festive cheer as you sail along sun-soaked summer shores. Cruise on Azamara Pursuit, your boutique hotel at sea, where practically everything is included and the atmosphere is laid-back. You can relax onboard on sun-drenched decks, in the refreshing pool, and revitalizing spa. There's never a dull moment onboard with celebrations, cultural performances, and cocktails! View more View less 16 Nights Cruise from $ 11,499 per person share twin Interior Stateroom Cruising with Azamara Cruises XMAS AT SEA SYDNEY NEW YEAR Sale Period : until 28 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Departs 19 Dec 26 | Sailing from Auckland to Melbourne Deal Inclusions 16 night cruise onboard Azamara Pursuit Azamara Cruises Onboard Inclusions Variety of Dining Venues & Room Service Beer, Wine, and Spirits All Day & Night Signature AzAmazing Evenings Unlimited Self-Service Laundry Tips & Gratuities Cruise itinerary Day 1: Auckland, New Zealand 19 Dec 26 Embarks 6:00PM The only city in the world built on an active basaltic volcanic field, Auckland’s warm, coastal climate allows for surfing at black-sand beaches, picnics in secluded coves, wine tasting and horseback riding. Day 2: Tauranga, New Zealand 20 Dec 26 Arrives 8:00AM Departs 5:00PM A popular coastal town with a subtropical climate, Tauranga offers beautiful golden beaches, lush parks and a laidback atmosphere, with an array of adventures including dolphin watching, hiking and fishing. Day 3: Napier, New Zealand 21 Dec 26 Arrives 1:00PM Departs 9:00PM In Napier you can visit Pania of the Reef (one of the most photographed tourist attractions in the country), take a guided city walk, explore Cape Kidnappers or enjoy the day wine tasting at local vineyards. Day 4: Wellington, New Zealand 22 Dec 26 Arrives 1:00PM Departs 9:00PM With its fantastic nightlife, the renowned entertainment district of Courtenay Place and an internationally recognized coffee culture, Wellington is often referred to as “the coolest little capital in the world”. Day 5: Christchurch, New Zealand 23 Dec 26 Arrives 8:00AM Departs 5:00PM Ōtautahi. The Garden City. The Most English City Outside England. It may go by many names, but one thing’s for certain: There’s so much to explore in Christchurch, you’re going to have to plan strategically. Day 6: Dunedin, New Zealand 24 Dec 26 Arrives 7:30AM Departs 4:00PM Bordered by the Tasman Sea, the Scottish-influenced city of Dunedin features many beautiful, white sandy beaches, the Otago Peninsula and wildlife unique to the area like the Little Blue Penguin and the Kiwi. Day 7: Milford Sound, New Zealand 25 Dec 26 Arrives 4:00PM Departs 7:00PM An unspoiled place of staggering and dramatic natural beauty. Milford Sound captures your attention and your imagination with staggering waterfalls and towering jagged peaks. Day 8-9: At Sea 26-27 Dec 26 At Sea Spend the day sailing in style aboard your boutique hotel at sea. Indulge in a treatment at Sanctum Spa, stay ship shape with a class at our fitness center, or lounge the day away on our sunny pool deck.In the evening, savor inspired Italian cuisine at Aqualina, or relish in a classic steakhouse experience at Prime C. Plus, you’ll find plenty of exciting evening entertainment, from thrilling shows at Cabaret Lounge to intimate performances in the Living Room. Day 10-11: Hobart, Tasmania, Australia 28-29 Dec 26 Arrives 8:00AM on Dec 28 Departs 6:00PM on Dec 29 The capital and most populous city in Tasmania, Hobart is wonderful for strolling the historic waterfront, famous for its Georgian buildings, climbing Mount Wellington or taking a day trip to Bruny Island. Day 12: At Sea 30 Dec 26 At Sea Spend the day sailing in style aboard your boutique hotel at sea. Indulge in a treatment at Sanctum Spa, stay ship shape with a class at our fitness center, or lounge the day away on our sunny pool deck.In the evening, savor inspired Italian cuisine at Aqualina, or relish in a classic steakhouse experience at Prime C. Plus, you’ll find plenty of exciting evening entertainment, from thrilling shows at Cabaret Lounge to intimate performances in the Living Room. Day 13-15: Sydney, Australia 31 Dec 26 - 02 Jan 27 Arrives 8:00AM on Dec 31 Departs 2:00PM on Jan 02 As the most populous city in the country, Sydney offers everything from the iconic Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge to popular sites like The Rocks, Manly Beach, Darling Harbour and the Taronga Zoo. Day 16: At Sea 03 Jan 27 At Sea Spend the day sailing in style aboard your boutique hotel at sea. Indulge in a treatment at Sanctum Spa, stay ship shape with a class at our fitness center, or lounge the day away on our sunny pool deck.In the evening, savor inspired Italian cuisine at Aqualina, or relish in a classic steakhouse experience at Prime C. Plus, you’ll find plenty of exciting evening entertainment, from thrilling shows at Cabaret Lounge to intimate performances in the Living Room. Day 17: Melbourne 04 Jan 27 Debarks 7:00AM A UNESCO City of Literature and oft considered the cultural capital of Australia, Melbourne is the hub of the film and television industry and is filled with vibrant street art, boutiques, restaurants and bars. Cabin Types Departs From Auckland from Auckland Club Veranda Stateroom The Club Veranda Stateroom on the Azamara Quest features a private veranda for uninterrupted ocean views. With two twin beds (convertible to a queen), a cozy sitting area, and modern amenities, it’s the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the fresh sea air throughout your journey. Auckland Cruise from $11,499 Per person based on share twin HOT EXCLUSIVE Includes Savings of $3800 per couple Travel 19 Dec 26 - 04 Jan 27 Please note: Stateroom images and features are samples only. Actual furniture, fixtures, colors, configurations and window/porthole views may vary. Terms & Conditions All cruise packages are based on Twin share, inside cabin and costs are per person. Availability is current as at 03 Nov 25 and deals are available until date shown or until sold out. Space is strictly limited and is subject to availability at time of booking. On board credit where shown is per cabin & must be spent on board and is not refundable in cash. All passengers are bound by the individual cruise lines terms & conditions, please ask your consultant for a full copy. Current Deals must be paid in full at time of booking or deposit dates as shown. All passengers must have a valid passport with more than 6 months validity at the end of their holiday. Travel insurance should be taken out at time of booking to cover in the event of any unforeseen cancellation. Included airfares are based on special non refundable economy fares, ground transfers are not included unless specified, any hotels included are on a room only basis unless specified. Hotels in certain destinations in Europe, USA and Asia may require local tourist taxes or resort fees payable at check in, We aim to give an indication of these where possible, but unfortunately you cannot pre pay this aspect of the hotel rate and must settle at check in. ESTA Visas are required for Itineraries visiting USA ,Canada, India, China, Vietnam, Schengen states & Sri Lanka. Visa costs are not included. Passports must be valid at least 6 months after the end of your holiday, If travelling on a non NZ passport other visas + NZ re-entry permits may also be required, please check with applicable embassy. Passport validity, Visas, Vaccinations and health requirements are the responsibility of the passengers. Individual cruise line T&C will apply based on the cruise line booked HOT CODE: CRUAZAPKG from $ 11,499 per person share twin Interior Stateroom Enquire now Close options Enquire now Call: 0800 713 715 Book a video call Cruise 'Tis the Season: Auckland to Melbourne New Zealand & Australia Enquire now Call: 0800 713 715 Book a video call Quick links Cruises Deals Destinations Flights Holidays Online Brochures Stores & Consultants About HOT Why HOT Careers Email Sign Up Gift Cards Travel insurance Video Appointments Media Centre Help & Support Contact us Help and Support Payment Options Privacy Policy T&Cs - Instore Bookings T&C’s - Online Flight Bookings Website Usage © House of Travel 2004-2024 The House of Travel App Want the insider word on all things travel?
